name: Super Shout 🎤
description:
Time moves only when you shout.

Instruction

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim, click to shoot
  • R to record video, R again to save your video (Streamer 📺 friendly)

Kill all enemies through levels and unlock new modes.

Made for the GameLoop Jam 0

Do you like it? Let me know. Make video with "R" and share it!

Thank you SuperHotTheGame
